description: Try our easy to follow Mango Butter recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Butter,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Sesame free,Halal,Christmas,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Mango,Peanut free
name: Mango Butter Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Process mango flesh with egg yolks, cup caster sugar and lemon juice until smooth.
Transfer to a saucepan and stir over medium heat until sugar has dissolved. Add butter, one piece at a time and whisk constantly until mixture thickens.
Pour into small clean jars, seal, label and store in the fridge. Note: Mango butter will keep in the fridge for up to 3 weeks.
